user.description: Do you have a MIDAS account? It is not your electricity account. There is no website to create one so if you have one already you likely created it here.

menu_options.auth: Yes, I have a MIDAS account.
menu_options.register: No, I need to create a MIDAS account.

register.title: MIDAS Registration
register.description: There is no website to create a MIDAS account so this integration allows you to create an account with this form. Please pay attention to the text below each field.

data_description.username: The username for the account being created. Must be globally unique and is not case sensitive.
data_description.password: The password for the account being created. USE A UNIQUE PASSWORD, IT CANNOT BE CHANGED. 15 or more characters, requires an uppercase and lowercase letter, a number, and a special character.
data_description.email: The email for the account being created. Has to be able to receive an email with an activation link.
data_description.name: The name of the user for the account being created. Not used for anything but is required by the API.

register_result.title: MIDAS Registration Success
register_result.description:
Your account has been created successfully. 
An email has been sent to the provided email, please click the link in the email to activate your account before proceeding.

auth.title: MIDAS Authentication
auth.description: Please enter your MIDAS username and password.

options.title: Rates
options.description: On many California electricity bills there is an "RIN" QR Code, scanning that code will give you a 16 character (plus dashes) code.
